mapper.insert: insert into com_user_extract_apply (id, com_user_id, extract_fee, extractway_info_id, apply_time, extract_way, extract_time, pay_time, audit_type, audit_cause, bank_card, bank_name, card_owner_name, deposit_bank_name, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{comUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{extractFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{extractwayInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{extractWay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{extractTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardOwnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depositBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update com_user_extract_apply
com_user_id = #{comUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
extract_fee = #{extractFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
extractway_info_id = #{extractwayInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
extract_way = #{extractWay,jdbcType=BIGINT},
extract_time = #{extractTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
audit_type = #{auditType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
audit_cause = #{auditCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_card = #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_owner_name = #{cardOwnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deposit_bank_name = #{depositBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, com_user_id, extract_fee, extractway_info_id, apply_time, extract_way, extract_time, pay_time, audit_type, audit_cause, bank_card, bank_name, card_owner_name, deposit_bank_name, remark from com_user_extract_apply where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, com_user_id, extract_fee, extractway_info_id, apply_time, extract_way, extract_time, pay_time, audit_type, audit_cause, bank_card, bank_name, card_owner_name, deposit_bank_name, remark from com_user_extract_apply

SELECT cuea.id, cuea.com_user_id,cu.real_name, cuea.extract_fee, cuea.apply_time, cuea.pay_time, cuea.extract_way, cuea.audit_type, cuea.remark FROM com_user_extract_apply cuea LEFT JOIN com_user cu ON cuea.com_user_id = cu.id

SELECT cuea.id, cuea.com_user_id,cu.real_name, cu.openid, cuea.extract_fee, cuea.apply_time, extract_time, cuea.bank_card, cuea.pay_time, cuea.bank_name, cuea.deposit_bank_name, cuea.card_owner_name, cuea.extract_way, cuea.audit_type, cuea.remark FROM com_user_extract_apply cuea LEFT JOIN com_user cu ON cuea.com_user_id = cu.id WHERE cuea.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update com_user_extract_apply set audit_type = 2 where id = #{id}
update com_user_extract_apply set audit_type = 1 where id = #{id}
update com_user_extract_apply set audit_type = 3 where id = #{id}
